name: Digital Recognition
tag_list: ugc-moderation-engine, rich-media-monetization, image-photo-video-screening, content-categorization-platform, social-media, user-generated-content
overview:
Digital Recognition is aiming to become the on-demand moderation solution provider of choice for Rich Media (image, animation, video) User-Generated Content (UGC), moderating against inappropriate to offensive content, uploaded across internet, mobile, gaming consoles and TV set-top box platforms.

Using proven and accurate image & video recognition technologies to update our international database, we enable UGC publishers (Online, Mobile, Media and Brands) and their platform/ service providers and agencies to convert their UGC properties and services into a Brand & Advertiser Safe environment to maximize the monetization of their rich media UGC assets from day one.

Digital Recognition is a privately owned company with a solid senior management team from Asia, Europe and the Americas. In combination, this represents decades of skill, experience and highly successful track records to implement the strategic vision of Digital Recognition. Our team is totally engaged in delivering consistent product innovation, professional delivery and customer relationship excellence.

Digital Recognition is headquartered in Denmark with presence in USA, Vietnam and Hong Kong that can engage locally with its clients from all continents. We are assisted by a growing network of local Digital Recognitionâ€™s Moderation Service Partners to satisfy your most complex and specific local needs.
